lead_paragraph: Residents are battling Cambridge over how the Out of Town News kiosk, a casualty of the internet and a cleanup effort, might be used.

headline.print_headline: Haven for Print Faces a Fight Over Its Future
headline.main: Harvard Square Landmark Once Rooted in Print Faces Fight Over Its Future

snippet: Residents are battling Cambridge over how the Out of Town News kiosk, a casualty of the internet and a cleanup effort, might be used....
abstract: Clean up of Harvard Square in Cambridge, Mass, is threatening future of Out of Town News, 61-year-old newspaper and magazine shop located in former subway entrance built in 1928; potential loss of historic kiosk is causing struggle between Harvard Square Business Assn and citizens group Our Harvard Square; historic commission is currently studying whether to grant kiosk landmark status.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Out of Town News (Cambridge, Mass, Retailer)
